mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CSTM(CSTM_ID, CSTM_NM, CSTM_AGE, CSTM_GND, CSTM_PN, CSTM_ADR) values (#{cstmId}, #{cstmNm}, #{cstmAge}, #{cstmGnd}, #{cstmPn}, #{cstmAdr})
mapper.select: SELECT CSTM_ID, CSTM_NM, CSTM_AGE, CSTM_GND, CSTM_PN, CSTM_ADR FROM TB_CSTM
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CSTM SET CSTM_NM = #{cstmNm}, CSTM_AGE = #{cstmAge}, CSTM_GND = #{cstmGnd}, CSTM_PN = #{cstmPn}, CSTM_ADR = #{cstmAdr} WHERE CSTM_ID = #{cstmId}
